pages.text: Glenearn is a ship carrying two large ramps and two small planes. Each plane is armed with several bombs and typically stay in the air during battle, only landing to restock on bombs.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/bomber)$(l)Bombardment/$$(br)One of the planes drops its payload, bombing up to $(l)7 Tiles/$ in a $(l)3 by 4 area/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)12 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/suppression)$(l)Crash Landing/$$(br)$(l)When Glenearn is destroyed/$, the planes have no way to land anymore. They crash into the battlefield, $(l)damaging 2 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
